name: Sales Conversation (In-Chat Sales Agent)
description: Primary sales flow for high-intent leads via chat interface

conversation_stages.name: Discovery & Qualification
conversation_stages.goal: Understand customer's current state and pain points
questions: What brings you to TitleApp today?
What are you currently using to track your [asset type]?
What's the biggest challenge you're facing with that?
How much time do you spend managing this each week?
conversation_stages.ai_instructions: Be curious, not salesy. Listen for pain points. Use prompts/sales-agent-system-prompt.md tone.
conversation_stages.success_criteria: Pain point identified AND urgency confirmed

conversation_stages.name: Show Value (Inline Demo)
conversation_stages.goal: Render a live example of TitleApp solving their problem

actions.description: Show a sample DTC for their asset type with live data

conversation_stages.ai_instructions: Don't just describe â€” SHOW. Render structured objects inline. 'Here's what your car DTC would look like...'
conversation_stages.success_criteria: Customer engages with demo (clicks, asks questions)

conversation_stages.name: Handle Objections
conversation_stages.goal: Address concerns before asking for commitment

common_objections.objection: What if I lose my data?
I need to think about it

conversation_stages.ai_instructions: Empathize first, then provide evidence. Use real customer stories where possible.

conversation_stages.name: Ask for Commitment
conversation_stages.goal: Convert to trial or paid customer
conversation_stages.closing_question: Ready to protect your [asset] with TitleApp? I can set up your account in 90 seconds.

escalation_rules.message: I can connect you with our team to walk through this together.
